text:
In the biological domains, lots of technologies are created. One of them is the meat in vitro. It's the new king of food, maybe the future food. Two technics can be used to produce meat in vitro. One of this is to take baby cow serum and put on the Petrie box during many time for the colonization with some additives. Stem cells are used. This king of meat could be the new meat in the future.
  Increasing of vegan people are promoted this new technologies as the impact of global warning. The meat in vitro will wondered less water than naturel meat for example.
  The meat economy would be important.
This experimentation are not without consequences. In fact, the creation of artificial meat is a way to reduce the methane gas produced by cow because the pollution is in heart of environmental problems. But artificial meat could be more pollutant than natural meat. However, this animals are very importance for the landscape. They allow us the maintain of different landscape. Without them, there will not landscape. Cow plays a role in the carbon stockage too and promote plants which are not consume by humans. One more, cow allow us to the fertilization.
  One more, it’s not ethical because scientist use animal serum to make them.
  Most of consumers want to eat natural products. We don’t know if the consumers will accept to eat this substitutes. Then, they can be reticent to eat white meat compared to natural red meat.
  Them, this product is not on the market yet. Actually, it’s very expensive (250 000 €)
